name: Black Diamond Alpine FLZ Poles - Unisex
description: Durable poles for hiking, trekking, snowshoeing, and ski touring. They stow compactly and deploy quickly when you need them.Natural cork grips with EVA extensions that let you choke up on steep terrain.3 sections fold Z-style for easy carrying. SlideLock technology and speed cones make reassembly fast and easy.Flicklock Pro mechanism offers up to 20cm of adjustment, and can quickly accommodate changes on long, undulating approaches or while traversing hills.Flex Tech Tips let you change between carbide or rubber tips.Includes 60mm trekking baskets and compactor powder baskets.
